programme.title: Tsurune - The Linking Shot -
programme.desc: The second season of "Tsurune". Minato Narumiya of the Kazemai High School Archery Club emerged victorious in the prefecture tournament and has been passionately practising on the bow every day. Tsujimine High School Archery Club, suddenly participates in the regional tournament as Eisuke Nikaido stands before Minato and the others with a fearless smile. Their thoughts, turned into arrows, are released from the bow. When these shots clash with one another, yet another answer, unbeknownst to a...

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy II: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Second season of “The Misfit of Demon King Academy”. The one that appeared in front of Anos, who prevented the war between demons and humans, is a new “Child of God” who has come to annihilate the tyrannical demon king Anos Voldigoad. The misfit who overcomes all odds heads on towards a new battle.

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 4
programme.desc: After receiving the highest national award for protecting peace in the “Cannibalism” incident, the Armed Detective Agency receives an urgent request from the government to investigate four murder cases. The Armed Detective Agency sets out to prevent the next murder, but it turns out to be a trap by the cunning “Demon”, Fyodor, who was supposed to be behind bars…! The Armed Detective Agency falls from its glory as it faces new enemies one after another. With friendships falling apart, can they...

programme.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV
programme.desc: Lili and the others reach Floor 27, where Bors had last seen Bell. However, only the gruesome aftermath of battle greeted them there. While Bell and Ryu run low on supplies and struggle to keep themselves alive on the deep floors, Ryu recalls the Astraea Familia, who was set on pursuing "justice". She begins to wonder what the right thing to do is.

programme.title: The Vampire dies in no time 2
programme.desc: After their many incidents together, vampire hunter Ronald and super small-fry vampire Draluc become a duo, along with the beloved armadillo John. On top of a new killer at Autumn Books and the nightly comedic happenings, familiar weirdoes and idiots come together, turning Draluc into dust! Will Ronald be able to protect the peace in Shin-Yokohama against the populating vampires?!

programme.title: HIGH CARD
programme.desc: Finn encounters a car chase and bloody shootout at a casino and learns that the world's order can be controlled by a set of 52 X-Playing cards that bestow superhuman powers upon their owners. He is then scouted as the fifth member of High Card”, a secret group of players who collect cards scattered throughout the kingdom while moonlighting as employees of the luxury car maker Pinochle. However, Pinochle's rival, Who's Who, and Klondikes, an infamous Mafia family, stand in the way of the gang....

programme.title: KanColle: See You Again on Another Quiet Blue Sea
programme.desc: Set in a world where humanity has lost control of the oceans to the "Abyssal Vessels", the only hope to counter this threat are young girls harboring the souls of warships, Fleet Girls. The story revolves around Shigure, a destroyer who has been newly assigned to the 1st Striking Force, 3rd Group.

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: After learning about each other's past, the Crimson Vow grew closer. Succeeding in their escort quest, the party take a short break, but… their bond will be put into test.

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: After a series of events, the Crimson Vow goes on a break. That's right; something every hard worker deserves - a vacation! The girls are enjoying their well-deserved vacation, but…

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: Pauline goes missing, just as Mavis receives a letter from home notifying her that her brother is getting married to… Pauline?! The girls' visit Pauline's hometown to find out more…

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: Money makes the world go round! Even in another world, money means more than one's life! To counterattack that little girl who's a terrible miser, Mile and party picks a risky job.

programme.title: Isekai Quartet (2 eps back-to-back)
programme.desc: Two episodes of Isekai Quartet, back-to-back!

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Xin discovers Ying Zheng, the young King of Qin, who's fleeing his half-brother's uprising. But when Piao's killer arrives to murder Ying Zheng, Xin, who's learned that Piao died serving as Zheng's stand-in, must decide which to help and which to kill.

programme.title: RWBY: Ice Queendom
programme.desc: Ruby returns into Weiss's dream, this time accompanied by Yang and Blake. The three girls learn about what Weiss thinks of them.

programme.title: Princess Connect! Re: Dive Season 2
programme.desc: The Shadows on Monster Isle form a swarm with the golems and launch an attack on the islanders. Meanwhile Pecorine suddenly disappears from sight. While the Caon members, along with Yuuki and the others, are putting up a desperate fight to protect the island, Kasumi comes up with a secret plan to stop the Shadows' progress.

programme.title: Zombie Land Saga
programme.desc: The next day, the girls perform at Saga Castle when they nearly break their masquerade as regular humans when one of the zombies, Tae Yamada – is accidentally decapitated on stage.

programme.title: Tokyo 24th Ward
programme.desc: Ran, Koki, and Shuta are childhood friends who reunite after a year. Out of the blue, the three receive a call from the same person.

programme.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy II: History's Strongest Demon King Reincarnates and Goes to School with His Descendants
programme.desc: Second season of “The Misfit of Demon King Academy”. The one that appeared in front of Anos, who prevented the war between demons and humans, is a new “Child of God” who has come to annihilate the tyrannical demon king Anos Voldigoad. The misfit who overcomes all odds heads on towards a new battle.

programme.title: KanColle: See You Again on Another Quiet Blue Sea
programme.desc: Set in a world where humanity has lost control of the oceans to the "Abyssal Vessels", the only hope to counter this threat are young girls harboring the souls of warships, Fleet Girls. The story revolves around Shigure, a destroyer who has been newly assigned to the 1st Striking Force, 3rd Group.

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: Money makes the world go round! Even in another world, money means more than one's life! To counterattack that little girl who's a terrible miser, Mile and party picks a risky job.

programme.title: DECA-DENCE
programme.desc: As Kaburagi knocks down the Gadolls with his tremendous strength and abilities, Natsume feels at a loss what to do as she finds herself in the battlefield for the first time in her life. Meanwhile, the true nature of the world that is hidden from humans like Natsume is revealed to the viewers...

programme.title: NEKOPARA
programme.desc: Chocola and Vanilla are going through a special training prior to the Bell Examinations. Azuki, Maple, Cinnamon and Coconut take on the role of trainers and start drilling the two.

programme.title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest 2nd Season
programme.desc: After Hajime and Kaori get separated from the others, Kaori feels powerless and loses confidence in her feelings towards Hajime. Hajime asks her if she is still willing to venture alongside him.

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid
programme.desc: Viola is about to visit Duke's manor when her brother, Walter, gets in her way. At the manor, Viola finds Cuff alone. Suspecting that Cuff might be a thief, Viola tries to hold her down, but…

programme.title: The Duke of Death and His Maid
programme.desc: A Christmas party is about to happen in Duke's manor. Disguised as a coachman, Walter follows Viola to the party. At the manor, Walter runs into Cuff even before he is able to see how Duke is doing…

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: Someone once said that a loner is apathetic towards those around them… Mile, the seasoned loner, notices it immediately. Will she ever find out Renny and the girls' intentions?!

programme.title: DECA-DENCE
programme.desc: Natsume learns how to fight under the tutelage of Kaburagi. Though the training is harsh, Natsume perseveres, and her fighting skills & physical abilities improve dramatically.

programme.title: HIGH CARD
programme.desc: Finn encounters a car chase and bloody shootout at a casino and learns that the world's order can be controlled by a set of 52 X-Playing cards that bestow superhuman powers upon their owners. He is then scouted as the fifth member of High Card”, a secret group of players who collect cards scattered throughout the kingdom while moonlighting as employees of the luxury car maker Pinochle. However, Pinochle's rival, Who's Who, and Klondikes, an infamous Mafia family, stand in the way of the gang....

programme.title: The Vampire dies in no time 2
programme.desc: After their many incidents together, vampire hunter Ronald and super small-fry vampire Draluc become a duo, along with the beloved armadillo John. On top of a new killer at Autumn Books and the nightly comedic happenings, familiar weirdoes and idiots come together, turning Draluc into dust! Will Ronald be able to protect the peace in Shin-Yokohama against the populating vampires?!

Along the way, they meet a small girl who calls herself a soldier.

programme.desc: The girls pick up a quest that no hunter wants to attempt, not knowing that a monster is behind it.However, there is more to the quest than meets the eye…

programme.title: DECA-DENCE
programme.desc: Natsume engages in a fight with the Gadoll for the first time after chasing Pipe, who had run onto the battlefield. She panics at first, but soon recalls the teachings of Kaburagi.

programme.title: Steins;Gate 0
programme.desc: In their struggle to save the time machine, the lab members brainstorm to circumvent convergence but realize it cannot be done without sacrifice.

programme.title: Steins;Gate 0
programme.desc: Okabe and his friends must battle against fate in the past, present, and future to find Steins Gate and reunite the lab members once and for all.

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Fleeing pursuit, Zheng and Xin struggle with exhaustion, and with each other. When they reach the appointed meeting-site, there's no sign of Zheng's sole supporter, Lord Changwen . . . and the murderous tracker Mu Ta is hot on their trail.

programme.title: Princess Connect! Re: Dive Season 2
programme.desc: On their way back from farming rice, Yuuki and company find a girl lying on the roadside, who turns out to be Chika, a member of Carmina. As they tend to her, they call over her fellow guild member Nozomi for help. But when Chika finally wakes up, she seems to be acting rather odd...

programme.title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest 2nd Season
programme.desc: Hajime's party reluctantly bids goodbye to Myu. Meanwhile, Liliana realizes that something is wrong with the people in the palace…

programme.title: HIGH CARD
programme.desc: Finn encounters a car chase and bloody shootout at a casino and learns that the world's order can be controlled by a set of 52 X-Playing cards that bestow superhuman powers upon their owners. He is then scouted as the fifth member of High Card”, a secret group of players who collect cards scattered throughout the kingdom while moonlighting as employees of the luxury car maker Pinochle. However, Pinochle's rival, Who's Who, and Klondikes, an infamous Mafia family, stand in the way of the gang....

programme.title: D_CIDE TRAUMEREI THE ANIMATION
programme.desc: Ryuhei finds a letter in his shoe rack while the others find the sender's old-fashioned approach suspicious. Through investigation, Ryuhei learns of an unexpected truth and he suddenly dashes off…

programme.title: D_CIDE TRAUMEREI THE ANIMATION
programme.desc: Unable to shake off his fear of the masked man's powress, Ryuhei reminisces the days with his elder brother. Recalling Rando's words, Ryuhei discovers that his brother has entered a Traumerei…

programme.title: Zombie Land Saga
programme.desc: With their funds running low, Kotaro books the girls to perform for a pharmaceutical company at a hot springs resort. But taking a dip in the hot springs makes them lose the sponsorship.

programme.title: RWBY: Ice Queendom
programme.desc: Ruby's party, along with Jaune, sneaks into Weiss's dream once again. Jaune releases the Sillies, and many little Weiss jump out.

programme.desc: In their struggle to save the time machine, the lab members brainstorm to circumvent convergence but realize it cannot be done without sacrifice.

programme.desc: Aiko is held captive in the Divine Mountain, and the demons have made their move. In the royal palace, Jose and Hiyama betray and attack Meld. Will Hajime and the others notice the imminent dangers?

programme.title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
programme.desc: Sakuta reveals to Mai and Nodoka about Kaede's lost memories and what happened two years ago. After she met Kotomi, Kaede continues to try to reach her goal of going to school, but…

programme.title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
programme.desc: After successfully going to school at night, Kaede suddenly regains her memories of her past self, and her memories with Sakuta over the past two years gets erased.

programme.title: Didn't I Say to Make My Abilities Average in the Next Life?!
programme.desc: Mile is defeated by the most powerful being in the world – the Ancient Dragon. What will become of the fate of the Reina and party as they put their faith in Mile?

programme.title: KanColle: See You Again on Another Quiet Blue Sea
programme.desc: Set in a world where humanity has lost control of the oceans to the "Abyssal Vessels", the only hope to counter this threat are young girls harboring the souls of warships, Fleet Girls. The story revolves around Shigure, a destroyer who has been newly assigned to the 1st Striking Force, 3rd Group.

programme.title: The Vampire dies in no time 2
programme.desc: After their many incidents together, vampire hunter Ronald and super small-fry vampire Draluc become a duo, along with the beloved armadillo John. On top of a new killer at Autumn Books and the nightly comedic happenings, familiar weirdoes and idiots come together, turning Draluc into dust! Will Ronald be able to protect the peace in Shin-Yokohama against the populating vampires?!

programme.title: Blood Blockade Battlefront & Beyond
programme.desc: The special headphones that allows Zed to breathe out of water is stolen by a sociopathic CEO of an arms dealing company forcing Leo, Zapp and Chain to steal it back.

programme.title: Blood Blockade Battlefront & Beyond
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when one of Leonardo's friends is transformed into a giant, vicious monster by a microscopic terrorist.

programme.title: HIGH CARD

programme.title: Bungo Stray Dogs Season 4
programme.desc: After receiving the highest national award for protecting peace in the “Cannibalism” incident, the Armed Detective Agency receives an urgent request from the government to investigate four murder cases. The Armed Detective Agency sets out to prevent the next murder, but it turns out to be a trap by the cunning “Demon”, Fyodor, who was supposed to be behind bars…! The Armed Detective Agency falls from its glory as it faces new enemies one after another. With friendships falling apart, can they...

programme.desc: Graham Norton introduces another instalment of his trademark mix of cheeky celebrity chat and live music performances.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S19)
programme.desc: Gretta has purchased part of a garden to design her a Malaysian-inspired single-storey, burnt wood and glass pavilion. Keeping it firmly in the family, brother-in-law Fernando also stepped into the role of project manager, despite zero building experience.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat (S1)
programme.desc: Nigella shares her go-to celebratory cake - a divine, layered chocolate and peanut butter cake that will make even die-hard haters of peanut butter relent.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars (S1)
programme.desc: This time, it's all about fast food as Gordon invites a secret panel of industry giants to help him in his search for Britain's best food or drink entrepreneur.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S5)
programme.desc: It's first week in a new heat and a new set of bakers are in for a tough challenge. First up they have to make Mont Blanc desserts with nothing more than a list of ingredients. Then they have to turn the trifle into a new exciting dessert complete with a standing showpiece sculpture.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1)
programme.desc: The remaining five cooks create two dishes that are judged on how they look when professionally photographed and how they rate on Jamie's social media snap poll.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (S3)

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4)
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London, the first time the hotel has allowed cameras to film behind the scenes. programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Africa Live

Produced by CGTN's studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country's business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN's English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The bi...

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin's very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what's relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China's perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region's top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world's most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. programme.title: China 24

It explores the country's business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

Even though Migo only takes advantage of the girls for one purpose, "GAMBLE". Even BIANCA, the most popular girl in school, Migo can flirt with her and he starts dating her. Initially Migo promised Bianca he would turn into a good guy, if Bianca would accept him as a boyfriend. But it turns out that all of that was just Migo's t...

programme.title: Day Care Cinta Mbak Crush Pok Amai Amai
programme.desc: Even though they shared a campus and had been neighbors since they were young children, MENTARI (Raisya Bawazier) and LEO (Fauzan Nasrul) never got along. They made noise whenever they got together.

programme.title: Cinta yang Hilang - Catatan Harianku
programme.desc: Melati is a young woman who works as a barista in a coffee shop. She has been dating Dastan, the son of a rich man, but has hidden his identity from Melati for a long time. But when he was about to be honest, Dastan actually got into trouble because his grandmother didn't approve of him. But because of sincere love, Dastan chooses to leave his family who is crazy about money for Melati, a simple woman but has a very kind heart.

programme.desc: Pallavi decides to keep Satvik's letter a closely guarded secret until the wedding is complete. Meanwhile, Satvik tries to convince Jeevika to agree to a simple wedding.

programme.desc: The ascetic instructs the Oswaals to light an oil lamp to ward off Charulatha's influence from the house. Meanwhile, Charulatha provokes Tara to avenge her defeat against Simar.

programme.title: Rowdy Inspector
programme.desc: A fearless policeman gets killed by a ruthless politician. Soon, a lookalike thief takes his place and vows to avenge his killing.

programme.title: Jeffrey Dahmer Killer Cannibal (S1)
programme.desc: Despite being a cold-blooded killer, Dahmer's likable persona allows him to get away with murder. But when a teenage boy escapes, Dahmer is charged with sexual assault and given a prison sentence.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After just 33 days of marriage, Mahmuda Khatun fatally stabbed her husband in the chest on his 28th birthday. What drove her to commit such a horrific act?

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S2)
programme.desc: In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered, but it isn't matched until 2018, when genetic genealogy helps point to one suspect.

programme.title: Jeffrey Dahmer Killer Cannibal (S1)
programme.desc: Despite being a cold-blooded killer, Dahmer's likable persona allows him to get away with murder. But when a teenage boy escapes, Dahmer is charged with sexual assault and given a prison sentence.

programme.title: Intervention (S13)
programme.desc: Todd was a successful house flipper, but when the housing market collapsed in 2009 he lost everything. Two severe accidents led to an addiction to painkillers, then meth. His family is left devastated.

programme.title: Intervention (S13)
programme.desc: Tiffany had the talent to be a thriving graphic designer, but post-natal depression resulted in opiate addiction. She has a new husband and baby, but her addiction could end the marriage - and her life.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life Or Parole (S2)
programme.desc: Richard Kinder was 17 when he and a friend committed a robbery that ended in a woman's death. Now 65, he believes he has demonstrated his rehabilitation.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S1)
programme.desc: A simple snack at a local restaurant turns violent when a grandmother is ripped off, but does not give up. A woman takes on the man who slammed into her van and then tried to run.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S1)
programme.desc: A brave grandma fights off two carjackers intent on stealing her truck, a woman stands up against heinous domestic violence, two assailants pull a gun on a store manager, and more.

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight (S1)
programme.desc: When Sue Snow suddenly dies from cyanide poisoning, police think this may be just another random event. But a second victim indicates someone has a personal, malevolent motive.

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight (S1)
programme.desc: When 17-year-old Missy Avila is found drowned in a woodland stream, police discover she has been beaten and her hair cut off. The investigation unravels a passionate story of rage, jealousy and betrayal.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives (S1)
programme.desc: The story of the dedicated investigation into Christy Mirack's murder and how DNA and the Bloodline Detectives traced her killer.

programme.desc: After just 33 days of marriage, Mahmuda Khatun fatally stabbed her husband in the chest on his 28th birthday. What drove her to commit such a horrific act?

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S2)
programme.desc: In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered, but it isn't matched until 2018, when genetic genealogy helps point to one suspect.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives (S1)
programme.desc: The story of the dedicated investigation into Christy Mirack's murder and how DNA and the Bloodline Detectives traced her killer.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S1)
programme.desc: A simple snack at a local restaurant turns violent when a grandmother is ripped off, but does not give up. A woman takes on the man who slammed into her van and then tried to run.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S1)
programme.desc: A brave grandma fights off two carjackers intent on stealing her truck, a woman stands up against heinous domestic violence, two assailants pull a gun on a store manager, and more.

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight (S1)
programme.desc: When Sue Snow suddenly dies from cyanide poisoning, police think this may be just another random event. But a second victim indicates someone has a personal, malevolent motive.

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight (S1)
programme.desc: When 17-year-old Missy Avila is found drowned in a woodland stream, police discover she has been beaten and her hair cut off. The investigation unravels a passionate story of rage, jealousy and betrayal.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers (S2)
programme.desc: When Darren Murphy saw his partner of less than three months, Olivia Dunlea, with another man, he stabbed the mother-of-three in the head and neck while she lay in bed.

programme.title: I Survived (S5)
programme.desc: A man high on PCP goes on the rampage, stabbing his 11-year-old daughter and viciously attacking and stabbing a neighbour and her son.

programme.title: Intervention (S13)
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman became a multi-millionaire. She then lost her fortune, her marriage and a healthy relationship with her surviving children as she spiralled into binge drinking.

programme.title: Intervention (S13)
programme.desc: Sierra was an honour student, but when a double-dealing artist charmed his way into her mother's life, he gambled away their home and the bottom fell out of Sierra's world.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: In the dead of night, a tattoo artist is shot in his home, and two informants identify a photojournalist as the shooter. The accused insists he has an alibi, but forensic evidence links him to the weapon.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S1)
programme.desc: A savvy poker player cleans up at the tables once at sea. But after she witnesses a man overboard, many begin to wonder if it was accidental or on purpose - and who could be next.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives (S1)
programme.desc: Follows the investigation into the Halling Rapist and how familial DNA helped solve the crime for the Bloodline Detectives.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S1)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewellery store, two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip, and convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S1)
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers, and a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Model and mother Samira Frasch loved the spotlight, but when her glamorous life ends unexpectedly in her mansion pool, investigators turn their eyes towards a web of heated relationships.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life Or Parole (S2)
programme.desc: This special offers an in-depth, side by side examination of two explosive cases involving juveniles initially sentenced to life without the possibility of parole.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S1)
programme.desc: A scratch and win ticket unveils an all-expense paid cruise for a young couple. But their luck runs out once aboard the ship as one of them ends up murdered.

programme.desc: Cecil and Larlane Brown have been together for years. But their secrets and lies, ignored and neglected for decades, threaten to turn their 50-year relationship into a bloody battleground.

programme.title: BTK: Confession Of A Serial Killer
programme.desc: Dr Katherine Ramsland gets first-hand insight into the mind of the BTK Killer, Dennis Rader, and the fatal mistake that led to his capture.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Charming and smart, Henry tried to hide his dark side, fuelled by years of abuse and twisted fantasies, until his first murder. Then, bad Henry took over.

programme.title: I Survived (S5)
programme.desc: A heavily-armed teenager goes on a killing spree in a Salt Lake City shopping mall. Passengers and crew of a sinking cruise liner are forced to abandon ship in a ferocious storm in the Indian Ocean.

programme.desc: A woman working alone in a store is attacked by a customer who drags her into the stock room and stabs her 31 times. A doctor is kidnapped at gunpoint by a meth addict demanding cash.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers (S1)
programme.desc: A teenage love triangle ends in bloodshed when Rachel Wade stabs her ex-boyfriend's new girlfriend to death.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S1)
programme.desc: This episode looks back at three cases that stayed with detectives. In Dallas, a man is dismembered, burned and dumped in a lake. Then, in Tulsa, two kids find their mother dead in her car.

programme.title: Court Cam (S3)
programme.desc: Two teenage former best friends face off in court, a cold-blooded murderer addresses the family of his victim, and a judge says the wrong thing at the wrong time to the wrong person.

programme.title: Court Cam (S3)
programme.desc: A teen sues her parents, there's chilling testimony from the mastermind of a murderous prison escape, and a hilarious judge handles the argument of a sovereign citizen perfectly.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S1)
programme.desc: A friendly entrepreneur and her son board a cruise ship for a much needed vacation away from their worries when she suddenly vanishes. Did her financial troubles get the better of her?

programme.title: The First 48 (S23)
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old high school student is found on the stairs of an apartment filled with kids, witnesses need to tell the truth so Tulsa Homicide can get to their shooter.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S2)
programme.desc: Unsolved crimes locked away in file cabinets. Painful memories are left to a victim's loved ones. Thanks to a special breed of detective, no one escapes the laws of justice.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: After an elderly man is murdered, the suspect shocks prosecutors when he goes against his lawyer's advice in court.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

programme.desc: Pirate Captain says he doesn't want to be the captain anymore. Noddy investigates how they can help him and he soon finds the reason for the Captain's distress: someone took his beard! Noddy sets out in search of the missing beard.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Revs and Tractor are doing Tom's deliveries together, but only Tractor comes back. Why isn't Revs with Tractor? Tractor is too upset to explain what happened, so Noddy investigates to find his friend.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's the Toyland Circus and all the toys are rehearsing an act - all except Smartysaurus, who rushes away, apparently too shy to take part. Noddy has to find a way to help Smartysaurus find an act for the circus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Action-hero Deltoid suddenly loses all his strength and finds himself totally helpless. Noddy quickly starts an investigation: How can he help Deltoid get his strength back?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends… until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc… until Zebby wonders what zebras do… together the animals discover that zebras stampede… which is great fun and very noisy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa wants to show Topsy his three favourite things. But when he gets to his friends house, they have disappeared. Raa Raa and his friends set out on a noisy adventure to find the missing objects

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Molecom is very grateful to Plugger for rescuing him after yet another of Flash's pranks. But Plugger is soon frustrated by Molecom's attempts to help… Meanwhile, Roary is trying hard to beat his best lap time.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Cici is fed up with never winning and decides not to take part in the race that day. Can Roary persuade her to change her mind?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach… only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Bands on the Run Casper and Jimmy form a rock band to compete in the Deedstown Battle of the Bands. Vote for Casper Mantha is angling to win the office of Class Rep, but Kibosh fancies having a fellow ghost in power.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Permission Impossible When Ra's parents refuse to let him go on the school camping trip, he sneaks away and gets lost in the Scary Woods with Casper and Mantha. What Possessed You? When a lesson in taking possession of a human body goes awry, Casper's human ends up taking possession of him!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: A prank leads to "crow pox" for the FAST snails, who make a treacherous climb to find a cure; Burn and her hippie sister try to end their rivalry.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing
programme.desc: Crackridge's new resident dinosaur has a hard time fitting in. Archibald and a new friend attempt to conquer their fear of the basement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a “No-Paperworkist” movement to avoid Buddy From HR's constant paperwork.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.desc: When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: When Mort is abducted by "aliens", King Julien teams with Clover, Maurice and Hector to investigate why he's not the one being abducted.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Poppy finds out there's a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: D-Structs becomes super-charged when Skrap-It installs a special spark bug, so the Trux must find their own spark bug to battle D-Structs' new power

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move hi...

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilb...

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: After Olivia teases Ian for being too short for a ride, Father mentions that someday Ian may be the taller sibling. Olivia employs a variety of comical methods to stop Ian from growing. She eventually comes to terms with her own height – with the help of a great pair of shoes!

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: The class bullfrog is lose, and Mrs. Hogenmuller leaves Olivia in charge as she goes to track it down. Olivia imagines herself as the sheriff of a Wild West town, keeping order and defending against a stampede of giant bullfrogs. But can shedo it alone, or will she need a little help – from Francine?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: NO COUNTRY FOR OLD MEN
programme.desc: A man finds a suitcase full of cash and becomes the target of a psychopathic killer and a cautious sheriff in this Academy Award-winning movie.

programme.title: JUDAS AND THE BLACK MESSIAH
programme.desc: Offered a plea deal by the FBI, William O'Neal infiltrates the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party as a secret informant to gather intelligence on Chairman Fred Hampton.

programme.title: THE TWILIGHT SAGA: ECLIPSE
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the Twilight franchise, Bella is surrounded by danger and an evil vampire continues her quest for revenge.

programme.title: ALVIN AND THE CHIPMUNKS: CHIPWRECKED
programme.desc: While vacationing on a cruise, the chipmunks find themselves on a remote island that is not as deserted as it seems.

programme.title: IT'S COMPLICATED
programme.desc: In matters of love, divorce, and everything in between, it's, well, It's Complicated.

programme.title: NOTTING HILL
programme.desc: Fame gets in the way of true love when a famous actress falls in love with a divorced London bookstore owner.

programme.title: THE BOURNE LEGACY
programme.desc: Members of the government's intelligence community try to erase all evidence of their top secret programmes.

programme.title: F9: THE FAST SAGA
programme.desc: No matter how fast you are, no one outruns their past. Dom and the Fast & Furious crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother, Jakob.

programme.title: FAILURE TO LAUNCH
programme.desc: The parents of a 35-year-old bachelor hire an expert to seduce him so that he can move out of their house.

programme.title: TOM & JERRY

programme.title: WANTED
programme.desc: A clerk with no future finds his world tossed upside down after he joins a secret group of assassins when he discovers he has special powers.

programme.title: THE LAST OF US S1
programme.desc: THE LAST OF US takes place 20 years after modern civilization has been destroyed. Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone.

programme.title: TRAINWRECK
programme.desc: A non-believer of monogamy, Amy leads a carefree life of zero romantic commitment until she falls in love with a charismatic sports doctor.

programme.title: MAGIC MIKE XXL
programme.desc: Three years after Mike retires from his stripper life, the Kings of Tampa reunite one last time to bring the house down with their muscles and moves.

programme.title: BELFAST
programme.desc: This British-Irish drama centres on a glamorous working-class family and their young son's childhood, as they get caught in the mayhem of Belfast's troublesome times.

programme.title: JARHEAD
programme.desc: A memoir of Marine Anthony Swofford's pre-Desert Storm experience in Saudi Arabia and stint in Kuwait.

programme.title: AGENT CODY BANKS 2-DESTINATION LONDON
programme.desc: Agent Cody Banks goes undercover as a student in a school in London where he has to keep other kids from discovering his true identity while carrying out his mission.

programme.title: ELIZABETH

programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Jingbirok: A Memoir of Imjin War
programme.desc: "Jingbirok" is a memoir written by scholar Ryu Seong Ryong who was a commander-in-chief during the Japanese invasion of Joseon era from 1592 to 1598. This drama is based on the "Jingbirok" and covers the political scenes of the mid-Joseon era from pre-Japanese invasion until the Battle at Noryang where General Lee Soon Shin died.

programme.desc: Twin sisters separated at birth are raised differently. Confusion ensues when years later they are mistaken to be each other.

programme.title: Movie - Ranga
programme.desc: Ranga, who was once a nice man, plans to kidnap a young boy while Raju, a former crook, decides to protect him. However, things change when their shared past is revealed.

programme.title: Movie - Vanchinathan
programme.desc: A cop, who can go to any means to arrest a criminal, is challenged by a popular newspaper owner, who always prints chaotic news. He was the eye witness to the murder done by the newspaper owner but he cannot prove it.

programme.title: Movie - Ninaivirukkum varai

programme.title: Movie - Naattamai
programme.desc: A wealthy man is known and revered for his just nature all over the region. His brother is married to an arrogant girl while there are others who are continuously plotting against this family.

programme.title: Movie - Aravaan
programme.desc: Kombodhi is the leader of a tribe, who steals from the rich to survive. He befriends Varupuli, who unknown to Kombodhi is a man who escaped from being sacrificed and is being hunted by his village.

programme.title: Movie - Thaai Naadu
programme.desc: Thaai Naadu is a 1997 Indian Tamil film, directed by H. R. Bhargava and produced by S. Shankar. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, B. Saroja Devi, Srikanya and Geethanjali in lead roles. The film had musical score by Rajan-Nagendra.

programme.title: Movie - Pagal Nilavu

programme.title: Movie - Per Sollum Pillai
programme.desc: Rajalakshmi raises Ramu, an orphan, as her own son who in turn always protects his foster family. However, he must stop his malicious foster brothers from marrying off their real sister to a gangster.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhal Mannan
programme.desc: Shiva, a mechanic, goes to Delhi to deliver a letter to Thilothama that is from her sister. However, Shiva falls in love with her, but Thilothama, though she reciprocates, cannot express her feelings.

programme.title: Movie - Dharma Puri
programme.desc: A rich landlord forces Sivaram's father, an honest hardworking man, to leave the village. However, years later, the villagers beg Sivaraman to save them from the cruel landlord and his sons.

programme.title: Movie - Amaidhi Padai
programme.desc: A homeless pauper, Amavasai works his way up to become a corrupt politician. However, his illegitimate son, a policeman, decides to destroy Amavasai for cheating his mother.

programme.title: Living Smaller (S1)
programme.desc: Meet one man who converted a charter bus into his very own adventure home on wheels, and a couple who transport their renters back in time with their 1960s inspired tiny trailer retreat.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: The second half of intimacy week sees the couples at their best and their worst as Alessandra's tasks put their relationships to the test.

programme.title: The Wrong Blind Date
programme.desc: Recently divorced Laura is encouraged by both her therapist and her daughter to get back into the dating game. She meets Kevin, but is there a sinister motive behind his kind gestures?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S14)
programme.desc: The final two cooks do battle in a two-challenge finale, beginning with a choice between three MasterChef challenges: the Mystery Box, the Brief, or the Cloche.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1
programme.desc: As the dry season takes hold in Zambia's Luangwa Valley, lagoons will start to dry-up and verdant grasslands will gradually turn to dust. Animals must make the most of the wet season's legacy whilst they can.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: It's one of the most dramatic events in the natural world. When a predator goes In For the Kill prey scatters, dust flies, and claws and teeth draw red. But how do nature's killing machines pull off these epic feats of speed, cunning and agility? Some use stealth to hide in plain sight. Camouflaged markings and hidden tunnels give some predators the opportunity to deliver their lethal strike. Evolution has created insects that mimic leaves, burrowing spiders ready to pounce, and an owl so sil...

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1
programme.desc: Snakes, spiders and scorpions: these creepy crawlies are the animals we connect with least and fear most. While it's true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1
programme.desc: Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1
programme.desc: As water flows from Australia's highlands into the seas, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for multifaceted interactions between predators and their prey.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center's release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don't go exactly as planned.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper's hawk who's taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre's skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals' stinky natural defences.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1
programme.desc: South Africa's Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africa's big cats.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1
programme.desc: In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, there's a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. These large pig-like mammals grow up to forty five kilos and have stripes of white hair underneath their chin which gives them their distinctive appearance and name.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil's clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic's favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who's the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta's loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix's search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil's clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic's favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who's the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1
programme.desc: There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where it's warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1
programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it – you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow – but full of monsters.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they're done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who's enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1
programme.desc: From their time as dangerous adversaries to colonialist hunters, who coined the term “the big five,” to the ever-present and considerable challenges of daily life, for the lion, African elephant, leopard, buffalo, and rhino, life isn't easy when you're big in the wild.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1
programme.desc: In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1
programme.desc: Join the team's scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who's having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill's new corrective shoes.

programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa's wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape's protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

While it's true they have some of the most venomous creatures in the world within their ranks, what is less commonly accepted is that they are often more scared of us then we are of them.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa's wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape's protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1
programme.desc: There are more species of beetle in the world than any other animal, and few play a role as important as the humble dung beetle. These tiny counterparts to Africa's giant plant eaters bring balance to a system that supports life like no other.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1
programme.desc: In many countries the vulnerable and elusive ocelot is on the Endangered Species List. But on the southern edge of the Pantanal, one of the world's largest tropical wetlands, this magnificent wild cat seems to be making a comeback. A team of young wildlife scientists is trying to understand why.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1
programme.desc: Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa's wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape's protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2
programme.desc: In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2
programme.desc: In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing – water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. It's a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: The Professionals

programme.desc: In 2022, Shinohara Tomoe's "The Leather Scrap Kimono" design won two awards at the prestigious ADC Awards in New York. She looks back on her career path and shares her passion for design.

programme.title: The Mark of Beauty
programme.desc: Today, many types of lamps are enjoyed in Japan, not only as a source of light, but also as a special item that can set the mood of any space. Join us as we cast light on the allure of the lamp.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.desc: As the invasion of Ukraine continues, a Russian reporter covers an anti-war-themed exhibition in Tokyo. She interviews participating artists, including a Ukrainian and a Belarusian, about their works.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE
programme.desc: It's edge-of-your-seat excitement as a high-speed transport boat departs for Edo carrying a rich cargo. Find out what's on the line for the stalwart crew as we break down their strategy.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: Tamahagane is a kind of steel used to make Japanese swords. Only a single workshop in Japan still produces it. Can its team of craftsmen overcome a series of challenges to produce a perfect batch?

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George decide to play a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelle's tent

programme.desc: It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.desc: Who's trying to steal Mr. Curry's prized Giant Pumpkin? PC Wells & Paddington are on the case.

programme.desc: Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies

programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.desc: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

Kinanti also befriends a girl named Dinda. Apparently, Dinda is a ghost who lives in that school. Since then, Kinanti and her friends have often dealt with ghosts. They always have interesting adventures related to the mystical world.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Nana is forced to marry Dewa by her father, Wawan. Nana's daily life is full of torture without love in their marriage. Meanwhile, Dewa who loves Alya from the beginning, insists on keeping their relationship going even though he is now a married man.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir and Sukma are a married couple who lived happily in simplicity in Magelang. They have a daughter named Zahra. Fathir works as a contractor, and Sukma is just a housewife. One day, Fathir received a big project. Unfortunately, there were issues with the project. Problems arose when Zahra was diagnosed with a chronic illness. The doctor suggested that Zahra undergo treatment in Jakarta.

programme.title: Doa Dan Air Mata Kakek Loper Koran Untuk Membahagiakan Cucunya
programme.desc: Since Hana's parents died in an accident, she had to live with her grandfather. Her grandfather will do anything to make Hana happy. However, Hana never appreciated her grandfather's efforts, and she left him because he was poor.
