programme.title: Not Out
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: BHOOL BHULAIYAA 2
programme.desc: When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit who has been trapped for 18 years.

programme.title: EK KA DUM 1
programme.desc: A rock star, who suffers from a mental disorder due to his bitter past, is convinced that his parents were murdered by three men. Taking the support of a journalist, he sets out to find the evil men.

programme.title: EK THA TIGER-EXTRA SHOTS
programme.desc: India's secret agent Tiger (Salman Khan) is hired on a government mission and falls in love with the enemy (Katrina Kaif). Will their love be accepted or fight their own beliefs to be together? (2012)

programme.title: MUJHSE SHAADI KAROGI
programme.desc: Preity and Vishal, who cannot stand each other, accidentally start talking when they use their friend's social media account to chat with their own crushes.

programme.title: MUJHSE SHAADI KAROGI
programme.desc: Preity and Vishal, who cannot stand each other, accidentally start talking when they use their friend's social media account to chat with their own crushes.

programme.title: EXTRAA SHOTS MALANG
programme.desc: Watch behind the scenes and meet the cast and crew of the movie.

programme.title: COMALI
programme.desc: After waking up from a coma, a man faces many difficulties adjusting to the current era.

programme.title: HIMALAY KI GODMEIN
programme.desc: After being attacked by bandits, Sunil, a doctor, is nursed back to health by Phoolwa, a villager. They fall in love and he decides to stay and help the villagers despite facing fierce opposition.

programme.title: ARADHANA
programme.desc: Dashing pilot Arun romances Vandana Tripathi, and both in love with each other, become very intimate, and as a result Vandana gets pregnant. Arun and Vandana have a quiet temple wedding.

programme.title: PAAGALPANTI
programme.desc: Three men, perceived as losers by society, wish to earn quick money and get rich. They, along with their respective girlfriends, hatch a plan to con two gangsters and steal their money

programme.title: Dial 100
programme.desc: Dial 100 is a 2021 Indian Hindi thriller drama film directed by Rensil D'Silva and produced by Sony Pictures Films India, Siddharth P.Malhotra and Sapna Malhotra. The film stars Manoj Bajpayee, Neena Gupta and Sakshi Tanwar in the lead roles.

programme.title: KGF: CHAPTER 1
programme.desc: A young man's promise to his dying mother leads him on a dangerous quest for power and wealth.

programme.title: DHARAM RAKSHAK
programme.desc: Despite protests, Kangeyan helps his brother marry a girl who is engaged to another man. But his brother is soon killed. Trouble ensues when Kangeyan decides to get his brother's widow re-married.

programme.title: ANTHAKU MINCHI
programme.desc: Raju, a young man, realises that he can earn quick money if he is able to prove the existence of supernatural beings. He suspects his sister's house to be haunted and investigates it.

programme.title: DANNY
programme.desc: Danny is a 2020 Indian action film written and directed by Santhanamoorthy on his directorial debut. The film casts Varalaxmi Sarathkumar in the main lead as a cop along with a Dog.

programme.title: DOR
programme.desc: Zeenat's husband accidentally kills a man in Saudi Arabia and the only way to save him from death is to obtain forgiveness from the widow of the deceased.

programme.title: EXTRAA SHOTS- PK
programme.desc: Aamir Khan plays a stranger with childlike curiosity asking questions which have never been asked before. Prepare to join him on a journey of love and laughter. Starring Anushka Sharma. (2014)

programme.title: ROWDY
programme.desc: Krishna, the son of a political don, after losing his mother, swears to seek revenge on all the culprits who are responsible for her death, which also includes his own elder brother, Bhushan.

programme.title: LOVE BREAK UP ZINDAGI
programme.desc: Two strangers, Jai and Naina, and their friends find their lives changing after attending a wedding as they struggle to find their true love

programme.title: KHAMOSHI
programme.desc: When a young woman with a speech and hearing disability decides to use her inherited property for charity, she invites trouble in the form of a killer.

programme.title: MR. NATWARLAL
programme.desc: When Natwar's elder brother is framed for bribery, he decides to avenge his brother's humiliation and thus poses as a crime lord.

programme.title: ATRANGI RE
programme.desc: A Tamil boy meets a girl from Bihar, what follows is a love story for the ages. A non-linear narrative of two romances running in parallel from different timelines.

programme.title: Ek Villain Returns
programme.desc: When a singer disappears during a serial killer spree, a taxidriver and a businessman's son cross paths in a disturbing tale where the lines between good and evil are blurred.

programme.title: SONU KE TITU KI SWEETY
programme.desc: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and it creates romantic comedy.

programme.title: HORROR STORY
programme.desc: Seven youngsters decide to spend a night in an abandoned haunted hotel. What they mistook as merely rumors, dawns on them to be the truth as they realize they are not alone inside.

programme.title: Kya Bolti Tu?
programme.desc: A girl with a complicated mind fall in love with a boy who have open feelings for her.

programme.title: SACHIN A BILLION DREAMS
programme.desc: A tale of a small boy with dreams and his journey to becoming the God of Cricket and the most celebrated sportsperson in his country.

programme.title: EXTRAA SHOTS- BEWAKOOFIYAN
programme.desc: Mohit a marketing whiz kid and Mayera, the financial brain with a penchant for shoes, are a couple in love but lacking money. Can you survive on just love and fresh air? (2014)

programme.title: EXTRAA SHOTS- HICHKI
programme.desc: After numerous rejections, a woman who has Tourette's syndrome lands a job as a teacher at an elite school. She tries to do whatever she can to make her troublemaking students realize their potential.

programme.title: LUCIFER
programme.desc: When the leader of a ruling party dies, there is a power struggle to fill his shoes. His adopted son, the mysterious Stephen, steps in and faces challenges in all spheres of life.

programme.title: EXTRAA SHOTS- KILL DIL
programme.desc: Dev and Tutu are brothers who were abandoned as kids when Bhaiyaji decides to adopt them and thrust them into a world of crime.

programme.title: Ashwamedham
programme.desc: Dhruva an undercover agent is on a mission to catch the culprits, who intend to loot the National treasure by using professional hackers.

programme.title: Check
programme.desc: Aditya, a conman, is falsely accused of being a terrorist by his lover and sentenced to death. However, in prison, he learns chess and becomes a champion to obtain a pardon while planning a jailbreak.

programme.title: KAROBAAR: THE BUSINESS OF LOVE
programme.desc: Friends Rajiv and Amar go their separate ways after Seema decides to be with Amar rather than Rajiv. Years later, prosecution lawyer Amar is delighted to see Rajiv in court and accused of murder.

programme.title: RAM BALRAM
programme.desc: Ram and Balram are 2 young boys who live with their loving parents. Their scheming uncle, Jagatpal, however kills the boy's father and mother.

programme.title: DHOOP CHHAON
programme.desc: Dr Paras travels to a small village in India to treat its inhabitants when a plague breaks out in the region. There, he falls in love with Lajjo, but his father forces him to marry Dr Manju.

programme.title: EKLAVYA
programme.desc: Eklavya, a guard, is entrusted the responsibility of safeguarding the lives of the members of a royal family. He tries his best to do so and keep their secrets safe.

programme.title: SUI DHAAGA
programme.desc: Mauji, along with his wife, Mamta, decides to start his own garment business. To make a name for himself, he enlists the help of various artisans and participates in a renowned fashion competition.

programme.title: SECTION 375
programme.desc: A filmmaker stands trial when a costume assistant on his movie accuses him of rape.

programme.title: Movie - THANGAMAGAN(NEW)
programme.desc: Tamizh, his wife Yamuna, and mother move into an uncomfortable home. Tamizh leaves them with his friend Kumaran while he looks for a job.

programme.title: SONGS
programme.desc: Enjoy an extensive collection of soul-stirring melodies.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Vanakkam Tamizha
programme.desc: In this programme, the hosts present the latest and most important updates and developments from across the globe, ranging from entertainment to technology.

programme.title: Anbe Vaa
programme.desc: Righteous and down-to-earth Bhoomika's sole ambition is to provide for her mother and sisters. On the other hand, Varun, a rich industrialist's son enjoys his happy-go-lucky lifestyle. A chance encounter brings them together and despite starting off on a wrong foot, they soon fall in love.

programme.title: Ethirneechal
programme.desc: [Rpt] Hailing from a middle-class family in a city, Keerthi becomes close friends with Poovarasi, a confident village belle.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ethirneechal
programme.desc: [Rpt] Hailing from a middle-class family in a city, Keerthi becomes close friends with Poovarasi, a confident village belle.

programme.title: Magarasi
programme.desc: At an accident spot, a young girl meets a dying woman and makes her a promise. Thereafter, she visits the victim's house along with the latter's baby and takes on the role of the daughter-in-law.

programme.title: Thalattu
programme.desc: Vijay, Isai and their son fit the portrait of a happy family. As an abandoned child, Vijay yearns for a mother's love and thereby strongly dislikes his unknown mother, a victim of family betrayal. Life takes a turn when his mother enters their home as a maid. Can Isai reunite the mother and son?

programme.title: Thirumagal
programme.desc: Anjali, a young bold girl, runs a food-on-wheels business with her father, while Raja who belongs to a rich Zamindar family falls in love with Anjali. Anjali questions anyone who is wrong, and is always at loggerheads with Raja's mother Aishwarya.

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Priyamana Thozhi
programme.desc: Pavithra and Adithya enjoy life with their unique and inseparable bond of friendship. What happens when life throws exciting changes and distressing obstacles in its way? Will their platonic relationship survive life's transitions and social challenges?

programme.title: Pandavar Illam
programme.desc: The ancestral house of Periya Sundaram and his five grandsons, the Sundaram brothers, is strictly barred to women. This 'only men' family takes a vow against marriage after losing their brother on the day of his wedding. Warm-hearted village belle Kayal is set on marrying the youngest Sundaram.

programme.title: Ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: Aruvi
programme.desc: Stern and traditional, matriarch Saraswathi runs a tight ship at her home. But Aruvi is a bold young woman who is all about breaking social barriers. Ironically, Saraswathi's son Pugazh marries Aruvi and brings her home as the unwelcome bride.

programme.title: Abhiyum Nanum
programme.desc: Mukilan is the mischievous son of Shiva-Meena and pampered grandson of Rajeswari. Abhirami, a sweet-natured little girl, enters their home out of nowhere and shares a special connection with Meena. Thus begins a beautiful tale that unfolds Abhirami's affectionate bond with the family.

programme.title: Movie - AAI
programme.desc: A military officer cripples his arch-enemy for killing his friend and escapes with his sister. He sets out to fight against this gangster when he comes to kill his friend's sister.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd -AAI
programme.desc: A military officer cripples his arch-enemy for killing his friend and escapes with his sister. He sets out to fight against this gangster when he comes to kill his friend's sister.

programme.title: ANANDHA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Sundari
programme.desc: Sundari is an ambitious girl whose ultimate goal is to become an IAS officer. Follow her inspiring journey filled with overwhelming odds and beautiful moments of joy as she strives to achieve her dream, while learning to embrace and love her appearance.

programme.title: Vaanathai Pola
programme.desc: Chinraasu, a compassionate villager loved by the whole village, and Thulasi, a cheerful young girl, are siblings who can go to any lengths for each other. Follow this unique story about the bonds shared by Chinraasu and Thulasi as they stand by each other while finding love and joy in the trials of life.

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Kannana Kanne
programme.desc: Goutham, a rich businessman, despises his daughter Meera as he holds her responsible for the loss of his beloved wife and immense wealth on the day she was born. Though Meera shares a special bond with her stepmother and stepsister, she grows up yearning for her father's love and affection.

programme.title: Iniya
programme.desc: An arrogant cop Vikram marries an open-minded Iniya to teach her a hard lesson, while Iniya's forced to tie the knot out of love for her sister & their mother's dying wish. What's waiting for Iniya in the new chapter of her life?

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ethirneechal
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani has always been a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.desc: After Ripper gives Alfred the name of a mad genius able to help him solve Esme's murder, he sets out to visit an asylum and talk to the inmate – Baroness Ortsey.
